data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Adrar, Algeria know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Adrar, Algeria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Adrar, Algeria.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 1464 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Adrar, Algeria.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Adrar, Algeria into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Belbali people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Adrar, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Adrar, Algeria.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Adrar that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.
